full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN PA BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES BSTAN BSRUNG SKYES BU CHEN PO DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA LA BRTEN NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL SPU GRI CHI ZHUR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI CHOS DANG 'BREL BA'I SLOB MA BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, ,RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA BRTZON 'GRUS DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB SOGS SLBO MA 'GA' ZHIG GIS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI 'DUN PAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA RKYEN BYAS TE SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SKU SKYES SU MA TE AE SA DHE MING CAN GYIS, ,DAM PA MKHAS PA'I ZOR 'DI NYID KYI YIG CHA GSAL BAR MA MTHONG KYANG, ,CHOS SKYONGS GZHAN GYI ZOR BSGYUR CHO GA DANG BSTAN SKYON MED DAM SNYAM PA'I LHAG BSAM DAG PAS @013A *, ,SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DGE SLONG BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,ZOR BYED NA MED BYED, ,ZOR TSUL DANG 'DRA KHRO BO PO'I LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SU MA TE AE SA DHE MING CAN,
